name: Triassic
description: $(l)WTF Triassic!$()$(br)The Triassic is characterized by the recovery of earth from the P-T Extinction shown by all the weird animals scrambling to fill ecological niches during the early Triassic followed by the rise of Dinosaurs in the Mid-Late Triassic and finally ending with an extinction event.$(br2)$(l)Portal Block: Dicroidium fremouwensis Planks
